summary: Adds two new spells, \"Conjure Ancient Frost Atronach\" and \"Ancient Frost Thrall\" allowing you to conjure a frost atronach from the dawnguard add-on.
descriptionHtml:
!REQUIRES DAWNGUARD!

I have had this file on my desktop for AGES and noticed it about an hour ago. I decided to finish it. I made it work. The stats of the atronach are EXACTLY the same as the one (small spoiler) you fight towards the end of dawnguard.

I will be making it better, please tell me what I can do to make it better. You can purchase the Ancient Frost Thrall spell tome from Phinis Gestor at The College of Winterhold after you complete the Conjuration Ritual Spell quest (You must be able to purchase the other thrall spell tomes from him for this one to be available :), you should be able to purchase the standard conjure ancient frost atronach spell tome from him if you are level 50+ conjuration (same as the standard frost atronach spell tome)

If you are stuck trying to get the Ancient Frost Thrall spell tome you can check out this video for help > http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MCmbTIj4cy4

Changelog:
0.2 - added the ancient frost thrall spell tome. Made both spell tomes only purchasable after the required level of the original frost atronach spell tomes. (can only buy after lvl 50 conjuration for the atronach and lvl 90 conjuration for the thrall.)
0.1 - Initial release
author: SONNYSPAK
